comments:
I was repeatedly executing org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.dependency.tests.ProjectEARRefactoringTests.testDeleteEARWebModuleWithValidation() to check if some validator fixes had fixed web.xml file locking and noticed the sporadic failure in an application.xml check (the module entry for the deleted web project wasn't being removed), saw the following in the console:

Unhandled event loop exception during blocked modal context.

Ok, Rob, I released a fix to head and to the build for 072706 WTP 1.5.1.  I think it should resolve your scenario, if not, there may be something unique about how your tests are running and we will have to investigate further.
